creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: predominately black, red, green, and white hat with gold thread decorations at peak; woven geometric decorations; long black fringe hangs on hat's back; hat circular in shape; bottom brim of hat outlined in green
dimension: 5 1/4 x 6 x 6 in. (13.34 x 15.24 x 15.24 cm) (without fringe)
title: Hat
